casebody.data:
YOUNG
v.
BAILEY, et al. No. 355PA14-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 4, 2015. Harvey L. Kennedy, Winston-Salem, for Young, Terri. Harold L. Kennedy, III, Winston-Salem, for Young, Terri. Sean F. Perrin, Charlotte, for Bailey, Daniel, et al.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 2nd of September 2015 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th of September 2015."
